hardware.name: Nitrokey
hardware.description: Protects emails, files, hard drives, server certificates and online accounts

hardware.name: Yubico
hardware.description: Yubico phishing-resistant, multi-factor authentication (MFA) stops account takeovers for the world's largest organizations

hardware.name: Flipper zero
hardware.description: Flipper Zero is a portable multi-tool for pentesters and geeks in a toy-like body. It loves hacking digital stuff, such as radio protocols, access control systems, hardware and more
